title: dilemma
content:
I got a kcet rank which will comfortably fetch me cse-aiml in pes but 200 ranks away from the cutoff of core cse
I am not interested in any other course except cse and have seen the FAQs regarding cse-aiml on this sub
should I just take cse-aiml in pes or look for cse in another college? if so I would appreciate suggestions

comments.body:
You should probably take cs in ec campus. 

I'm not sure but if you're not getting pes rr cs, you're probably not getting bms either. 

Unless you really like rr's location, just take cs in ec. 

Otherwise aiml is not very bad. 
The degree says cse(aiml). Not just "aiml" like some other colleges

Also the syllabus as of second year is almost the same. The only difference is 3 courses and they are the same as cs and some extra. 

Nobody knows what the third year will be yet so i can't comment on that, but I'm hopeful that it won't be so different

Thank you for your reply, ec campus is too far for me to commute to so I'm avoiding it

I think I'll end up taking cs aiml in PES

wait till 2nd or 3rd round if you are 200 ranks away from cse then you should wait dont do the mistake of taking aiml like me,  bcoz i missed cse in 3rd round councelling and i  regret till date(im in 2nd sem)
